name: Time Step
description:
Time Step is my first ever release, made for the Weekly Game Jam 150

Theme: You're the enemy

The only thing that can kill you here, is you! Run around killing innocent robots while avoiding your past movements, but don't let the time run out!

The following assets were used:

https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset

https://managore.itch.io/m3x6

Feel free to leave feedback below, I'd be glad to improve the game if it's worth it!

Want to support me and follow my journey through game development? Join me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thermohalia
